text: wqal alkafirun yawm alqyamt: rabana 'iinaa ataena aymtna fi aldalal wakubara'ana fi alshrk, fazalwna ean tariq alhuda wal'iyman. rabana edhdhibhm min aleadhab mthlay edhabna aldhy tedhbna bh, watrdhm min rahmatik trdana shdydana. wafi hdha dalil ealaa 'ana taeat ghayr allah fi mukhalafat 'amrih wamur rswlh, mwjbt lskht allah weqabh, wa'ana alttabie walmtbwe fi aleadhab mshtrkwn, falyahdhar almuslim dhlk
